product_name: The Rogue River: A Comprehensive Guide
long_description: Spiral-bound and printed on waterproof paper, this rugged guide has all you need to enjoy the Rogue River from Prospect to Gold Beach. Author: Matt Leidecker. Softcover; 93 pages; color photographs and maps. Idaho River Publications; copyright 2008. Large topographic maps take you down every mile of the canyon with detailed descriptions. Includes a trip planning section, detailed rapids descriptions and meticulous diagrams, historical points of interest, the Rogue River Trail, 60 hikes and geological history. Guide is 11 x 6 in. and designed to lie flat on the boat; waterproof paper and ink are designed for use in the canyon.
short_description: Spiral-bound and printed on waterproof paper, this rugged guide has all you need to enjoy the Rogue River from Prospect to Gold Beach.
